comment.author: 74784995@N00
comment._content: This looks like an Avro Aldershot (2 prototypes: 15 production aircraft)http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Avro_549_Aldershot www.raf.mod.uk/bombercommand/images/h1378.jpg A large aircraft for one engine with a 68ft wingspan...the RAF switched to multiple engine bombers after this..... (so how come the Fairey Battle?)
